title: How To Grow Your Relationship with God & Understand the Gospel
description:
Do you desire to understand who God is more?  Is the gospel confusing to you? Do you have a negative impression of Christianity based upon your past experiences? Then this podcast is here to help! Listen as Jeanine gives you all her advice on how to intimately know the Lord more, how to know Him better, how to change your life, and to overall, understand the Gospel! Jeanine will go through several things she's implemented in her life that have contributed to a massive spiritual change in her life. Thanks for listening and remember to stay Happy & Healthy! 

Connect with me on Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/jeanineamapola/

Follow the Happy & Healthy Podcast and leave me suggestions there! - https://www.instagram.com/happyandhealthypodcast/

--- Send in a voice message: https://anchor.fm/happyandhealthy/message Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/happyandhealthy/support
